TestItem.Stem: 8. In paragraph 7, the author provides information about genetic studies to

Distractor_list.Distractor: (A) suggest that researchers have ignored a crucial piece of evidence
(B) support an earlier assertion about the problem with classification
(C) argue that new studies will eventually prove that the salamanders are part of the same species
(D) assert that the presence of a common ancestor is the most likely explanation for the different types of salamanders found in the valley
